website_summaries.verdict: Excellent craftsmanship, precision blades, and functional design combine to make this pill splitter a great option when it comes to cutting most types of pills.
pros: Cuts pills almost any way you want them
Patented angled twin blades made of aircraft-grade aluminum split pills
Unit can also be used as a pill box
cons: On the higher end of the price spectrum
Has a learning curve until you get used to the cutting mechanism
Somewhat tedious to use on very small pills

customer_reviews.title: useless for small tablets
customer_reviews.text: This tablet would be fine for large tablets (e.g., an extra strength Tylenol tablet), but for anything smaller (e.g., something the size of an aspirin tablet or smaller) it is close to being useless. The cutter is not sharp enough and just crushes the tablet. I have tried numerous tablet splitters and for smaller tablets, a razor blade or a blade from a utility knife seems to work best.
customer_reviews.author: desert SW customer

customer_reviews.title: If you’re looking for a pill crusher, not a splitter, this is perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Does not work. Simply worthless. See picture... it is worth 1000 words for sure. It crush, smashes, crunches, shatters, and chips pill, but it absolutely does not split then into equal halves. Way over priced. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: T Anderson

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING-PERFECT FOR MY SMALL, ROUND PILLS!
customer_reviews.text: The awesomeness of this product inspired me to do my first-ever video demonstration! This is worth EVERY penny! It split my small, round pills evenly every time without crumbling them. It holds the pill secure before/during splitting (watch). Looking at the picture, I couldn't IMAGINE how this would work, but it's GENIUS and easy to use & very durable & I'm sure this will last forever! It's made in the USA too! (I was NOT paid in ANY manner for this review, I just felt the need to "spread the word").
customer_reviews.author: Linda Sangerman

customer_reviews.title: Was great while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: For $30 I expected very high quality material which for the first month i thought i had. I actually suggest to multiple people to get this. I had pills I couldn’t cut into 1/4’s with any other and with this i cut into 1/8’s!! But just after a month (of course the return period) it chipped during use and now it doesn’t work. So disappointed thats a lot of money down the drain and i cant afford to spend another $30 on a pill cutter :(
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: waste of money
customer_reviews.text: hard to pills in several pieces especially the thicker pills and takes longer to cut pills individually. only good thing is that the pill drops into the splitter body. crushed pills though and hard to hold pills in place. big waste of money ineffective. period. would rather use old fashioned pill cutter even though this one is basically like the old-fashioned pill cutters
customer_reviews.author: Aileen M.

customer_reviews.title: mnot good for small pills
customer_reviews.text: Very unimpressed. The pill we have is very small and must be cut in half as close as possible as it is a 25 mg. dose that needs to be 12.5. To use this splitter you have to try and stand the pill upright and hope it's centered. Used magnifying glass for better alignment but still unacceptable split. Definately not worth the higher than normal price.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: This is a well made cutter but is absolutely useless for accuracy in splitting meds
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made cutter but is absolutely useless for accuracy in splitting meds. There is no way to hold a pill in the jaws of the cutter to split half way. Good job on the milling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Almost impossible to accurately divide in half pills without a score line. I pinched my fingers very often.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E. Rupell

customer_reviews.title: The pill is not splitting cleanly and leaving a lot ...
customer_reviews.text: The pill is not splitting cleanly and leaving a lot of crushed pieces. Not sure if mine is defective? The pill has a score on it and isn’t a very large pill so I’m not sure why it is doing this.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to work with
customer_reviews.text: May be it is me; however, I found this to be difficult to work with a best. Nothing to hold pills in place when trying to split. I can not see what attraction is here...high cost/low utility.
customer_reviews.author: ccl

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I'm not the type to spend that kind of money on a pill cutter but I have a little dogs and I need to constantly cut their pills I had no luck with those cheapy ones... it's a tiny bit hard sometimes to put the pill exactly where you want it at first... but I've mastered it I could say if you don't have nails you could use tweezers ....and it cuts great I really like it I think it's great especially if you need to cut a lot of pills... You do need to really push hard so if you have grip problems or sore fingers that might be an issue just an FYI otherwise you'll love it
customer_reviews.author: HH

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Pill Splitter
customer_reviews.text: I'm a pharmacist. Out of all the pill splitters I've seen, this one is by far the worst. True, it probably does last a long time. Unfortunately, it crushes tablets and is not at all accurate. If you want a crappy pill splitter that gives worse dosing than breaking it with your bare hands, this is your product. If you actually care about whether or not you're getting the right dose, keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Health Advocate

customer_reviews.title: F is for Frustrating Failure
customer_reviews.text: Equadose splitter worked well at first. It has gotten less accurate with use. With a strong light, positioning the pill on the blade using the split line made into the pill I get two very unequal halves over and over. My guess is that most of the positive reviews are from folks with a new Equadose...and the negative reviews from those who have used one for a while. Not good at all and quite expensive. Might as well buy the cheapies and add them to the landfill along with my Equadaose.
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pill cutter!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pill cutter!! It cut my small pills almost flawlessly. Out of 28 pills, it messed up 1 and not too bad either because I put the small pill on it's side-which is tricky to do but that's what the manufacturer recommends. The pills I had would crumble under an ordinary knife but not in this pill cutter and never when I did it the easy way of just laying the pill down flat so that it didn't need balancing. Also, close the container lid and squeeze the cutter shut with both hands on the metal parts. Very easy to do. I took some pictures so that u can see the kind of small pill I was using.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: American Made.  It Shows!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most expensive pill cutter I have ever had. And you know what? It is the very best. I wish I had had the opportunity to buy this chunky monster YEARS ago! How many plastic pieces of garbage labeled "pill cutters" have I gone through! With their dull blades and uneven plastic lids. I could have saved a fortune. This heavy little pill cutter is amazing. The cuts are nearly perfect. Pills never go flying. And it just FEELS good to hold and use. I have cut octagonal pills, smooth ovoid pills, scored pills, etc. Every cut is straight. If you have to cut pills, buy this one. It pays for itself. It feels great. It looks cool.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Castle

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, even on tiny pills!
customer_reviews.text: This is really incredible, especially for small pills. My cat takes two medications and both are really small pills that need to be cut in quarters and are not scored. I went through 4 or 5 plastic splitters before someone recommended this to me. What a dream! You have to take your time to get the placement just right but the pills are always perfectly cut. No more crushing! It's a bit pricey on the front end, but so worth it because I'll have this forever!
customer_reviews.author: Monkeysee

customer_reviews.title: Great pill splitter
customer_reviews.text: This is really an excellent pill cutter. I tried one that cuts from the top and it left powder and was rarely accurate. I am meticulous about cutting because I am slowly tapering down a sleep medication, and it allows me to cut accurately regardless of how small I want the dosage. I draw a line on the tablet with a grafite pencil to cut with the splitter, then use a utility knife to get it to the particular size I want, which minimizes waste. (If a ballpark dosage is good enough for you, you wouldn't need the utility knife.)
customer_reviews.author: Samantha G Iyer

customer_reviews.title: Good cutter just needs a lot of improvements.
customer_reviews.text: The products cuts well but it is hard to open if you are elderly. Having some kind of handles on both sides would help. Also it would be nice if it was spring loaded. It can be difficult to open after cutting a pill. The cover gets in the way. After cutting a pill the cover will move and not allow me to dump out the pill. It would be nice if bigger. Easier to handle. I would get rid of the cover all together and concentrate on making just a good cutter. Re-enngineer.
customer_reviews.author: 12nv

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny. Fantastic and functional. Great design.
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievably awesome. I take a lot of meds, unfortunately, and some need to be split - and they are not round with a score line!! This allows you to carefully position (you choose the break line -- for weird shapes you have to pick where you think the volume is the same on either side). You set it. You push. And done. Clean, no razor, just amazing. And you can close it right up. It is solid and heavy. Awesome little thing. Just thrilled to know that I basically will NEVER buy another pill cutter than breaks ever again. Great solution for an annoying problem, folks. Well done. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: N. Black

customer_reviews.title: Well made, convenient - 4.5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Somehow I thought this splitter would not cause any shattering or splintering of the pill; but a lot of that depends on the composition of the pill and this is much easier than manually saw-cutting with a razor blade. I split the pill, got a low level shatter and I take the one half and leave the other half in the housing for the next day. Very convenient. Tactile quality is also very good, feels solid, expect it will continue consistent results for the foreseeable future. I deduct half a star for the very minor shatter still produced though that's probably not even the fault of the cutter.
customer_reviews.author: Lead-foot

customer_reviews.title: Better than a knife
customer_reviews.text: I am new to taking supplements. I had been trying to swallow a very large capsule that would start to dissolve in my throat before I could finish swallowing it. It caused distress and discomfort. Someone suggested cutting it in half. Why didn't I think of that?! I tried a knife, but it wasn't a clean cut. I had bought this product for my sister and she is very happy with it. So I ordered the exact same one. It came today and I've already tried it. It's perfect. Easy to use. Well made. And the exact results I was looking for. I think it is literally a life saver.
customer_reviews.author: Rockin' Senior

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this pill splitter ESPECIALLY for very small pills!!
customer_reviews.text: We have to split two very small round pills in half that are not scored for spllitting. Cutting them in half with other pill splitters or with a sharp knife has been frustrating, to say the least! NEVER even and lots of crumbling. When we watched the instructional video on YouTube, we noticed we did not get the updated model with a groove to seat the pill between the blades. Before contacting seller to replace, we tried splitting pills and find that we do not need the updated model. We can successfully split these pills evenly with no crumbling. We are VERY happy buyers and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Sheflin

customer_reviews.title: Not for small round pills
customer_reviews.text: Takes massive dexterity to put a small round pill in it. Not suited for older hands that cannot manipulate small pills into the splitter. Sorry I bought it.. I'm not returning it because it would probably work for larger pills but for a 20 mg Pepcid FORGET IT
customer_reviews.author: Cyndy A. West

customer_reviews.title: A heavy-duty pill cutter worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: This pill splitter is cleverly designed. The mass of the metal container is focused at the point between the two circular compartments where you place the pill and the force created at the point is intense enough to split the pill with ease. The translucent blue top slides over the compartments before you split the pill so each half lands in the left and right compartments and cannot fly out of the splitter. I cut a few at a time and just leave them in the compartments for storage until used up. A pill is no match for this cutter, so wear and tear should be negligible long-term. This one is worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: StephNYC18

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality Splitter
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a large number of splitters. The first thing I noticed about this one is the fit and finish. The build quality and precision machining is by far the best I've found. It is a little more expensive than most of the others I've tried but again the quality of it easily justifies the extra cost compared to the other splitters with similar designs. I highly recommend this compared to the box full of inferior quality splitters I've tried over many years. I have no affiliation with this company, I'm just a very satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: KEM

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: I was like a lot of other reviewers and balked at the $30 price tag, but this thing is awesome. Split my tiny pills with ease where my super sharp paring knife just crushed most of the pill to dust. It definitely requires reasonable finger dexterity/ vision to center(in my case I found slightly off center to give me even pieces, by that may just be these particular pills) the pill in the blades, but other than that it's a snap to use and I can see it working well for quite some time without wearing down. Definitely worth the money if you're cutting pills on a regular basis.
customer_reviews.author: lys22

customer_reviews.title: Great investment
customer_reviews.text: Extremely sturdy. Much better than the razor blade cutters that are out there. Small drawback, If you don't send to the pill exactly it will not split 50/50. You may end up with a 60/40 split ( 1 half is bigger than the other). The only problem is exact dosing can be tricky if pull is small, round or Not Pre-scored Since I'm doing this multiple times daily, I've gotten pretty good at finding where to place the pill to get an even 50/50 split. So.. practice makes perfect.. And at that point it will be the best investment you made in a pill cutter. 😁
customer_reviews.author: m evans ogle

customer_reviews.title: Nice desisgn but poor construction
customer_reviews.text: This pricey splitter crushes the pill rather than splitting it. The dull imperfect casting has the jaws not perfectly matched so the splittler twists the pill as well as crushing it. The must cheaper splitter do a better job.
customer_reviews.author: Fledermaus

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to use
customer_reviews.text: Very well made product, it is heavy, sturdy. However, it is awkward to use compared to the common pill cutters. The pill must be positioned by eye and hope for it to stay in place before cutting it. If you need to cut several pills, it’ll take considerable more time to get the job done than would be the case with regular pill cutters. Generally speaking, an overkill of sorts that won’t do the job better than the others. Lastly, it’s rather... strange that they offer a gift in exchange for a review in Amazon. Good try, just not quite better than the cheaper common pill cutter. Sorry.
customer_reviews.author: J. M. S.

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: This pill splitter is a huge step up from using an exacto knife, which had me splitting my pills into several useless crumbs. The compartments aren't tall enough for all the pills we need to cut, but can easily be kept from flying away by covering up with a hand. The splitting edge could also stand to be a bit sharper/more precise, but again, still miles better than any attempt at splitting with a knife. It's very easy to pinch and splitting is a snap. You can even store your split pills in the box. It's very compact and I love the sturdy weight of the materials.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective
customer_reviews.text: Over priced ineffective, two people look at it, both where baffled by it, one tried it along with me, took forever to line up and split pill in half, the results where far from desirable. The place I purchased wants almost 14.00 dollars for return. Wasted 29.95 and my time, don't understand the good ratings this product has. 5/3/19
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Give this pill splitter the Gold Medal!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! Some of my dogs are very mature (old) and take medications. I have tried at least 5 different pill splitters. I would end up wasting pills due to shattering, uneven cuts or just being smashed. The Equadose is amazing! I have used it on all the different pills - soft, very small, very large and every kind you can imagine. A perfect split every time!! I have spent enough on the other kinds of splitters and unusable pills to have paid for the Equadose at least twice. Do yourself and your wallet a favor - go straight for the Equadose!! No hype, just the truth!
customer_reviews.author: T A

customer_reviews.title: Best pill splitter I’ve ever had
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate the design of this pill splitter because until the others, this distributed the blade on the pill all at once. It prevents the pill from crumbling, which was a constant problem with the others I’ve had. Positioning the pill is a bit tricky, especially if there is no cut line on it and it’s tiny. But I got the hang of it after two tries, so it’s not a huge issue. The blades are sharp and cut evenly and cleanly. It’s well made and solid. Very happy with the purchase and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: kswen

customer_reviews.title: Not too good
customer_reviews.text: not that great. I can't get it to cut a pill without issues such as crushing it.
customer_reviews.author: Slim Pickens

customer_reviews.title: Yep. Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't help myself; I bought this thing despite it being drastically more expensive than the other pill splitters available. The reviews are just stellar... what could inspire such admiration? I figured it was returnable if it was truly awful. Arrived. Tried it. Works perfectly, feels solid in my hands. Looks pleasant, beautifully made. (I also like supporting a family owned business rather than buying a disposable overseas product for a fraction of the price.) If your vision isn't great this might not work well for you; it requires eyeballing lining up the pill to split, but I haven't had an issue with that. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Em Pogo

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother unless you're interested in having to buy extra pills!
customer_reviews.text: This is poorly designed. It's very difficult to position the pill so that it cuts accurately. It requires that pilla are placed on their side to cut in half and I've lost a few because they've slid & moved after I placed it in the slot. I can't imagine anyone with any dexterity issues attempting to use this. Poorly designed and I suspect the positive reviews are fake.
customer_reviews.author: TechDamsel

customer_reviews.title: Great pill cutter
customer_reviews.text: I really didn't want to spend the money for this item, but all the other pill cutters cut the pills into several pieces. Plus, I thought that I would eventually spend the same amount of money by replacing the metal rasor pill cutters. I really like this pill cutter! Cuts pill into halves instead of pieces, large pills and small pills. Easy to use. The pills I cut do have scoring on them so it's easy to place them just right to be cut. Glad I spent the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ricia

customer_reviews.title: Best pill cutter ever!  Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I had a couple cheapo plastic pill cutters, but they never cut cleanly and my pills would crumble. I kept using my husband's Equadose Pill Splitter until I finally decided to bite the bullet and get one for myself. Once you get the hang of centering your pill it works like a dream I never have to throw away a crushed pill. They slice cleanly and evenly in half no matter how small. This pill cutter is so well made it looks like it will last a lifetime. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mara C. Sides

customer_reviews.title: An expensive paperweight
customer_reviews.text: First, there's no real easy way to line up the cutter with the scoring. Then, not only does it crush more than cut, but the cover to hold in any flying debris is flush to the cutter which makes it useless for tablets with a circumference more than the height of the cutting part. A shame, as the weight is good and I like the compartments, but the design is so poorly implemented.
customer_reviews.author: R. Poole

customer_reviews.title: this works well for most pills
customer_reviews.text: this is amazing at cutting hard pills. In the image, I show how I had to cut a tiny little pill into 1/4ths and it worked 100% of the time. However I have another pill I have to cut in half and it is a softer pill, this one is crushed so I had to go to the razor cutter. Using the right tool for the right job is essential. This cutter is fantastic for hard pills. One negative is positioning the pill can be time-consuming, and slippage is a slight problem.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy PerryTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Best pill splitter ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best pill splitter that I have ever used. It is incredibly sturdy and well constructed. The only plastic is the little blue cover that is used to prevent the pills from popping up and out in the process of cutting. The device then serves to hold the two half pills. I purchased it to cut pills that are not scored and even without the score it made a perfect cut - clean and even and no crushing. I wonder if those who wrote negative reviews were using it incorrectly.
customer_reviews.author: Secret

customer_reviews.title: Not particularly great...Wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this pill splitter for close to a year now and find it to be entirely overrated. As others have pointed out, it chips and crushes pills, but rarely does it actually do its job and cut a pill in half. I've had $5 pill cutters that do a much better job. If I had it to do all over again, I would have never purchased this item. Save your money and buy something that actually does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Fluglowe

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this cutter
customer_reviews.text: I have struggled with several plastic pill cutters which broke after a little use and where the cut pills fell into the body of the cutter and were otherwise cumbersome to use. I was hesitant to try this cutter because of its high price but am very pleased with it after over 1 year of use. It is well made and while some reviewer said it was hard to position the pill accurately, I have no trouble holding the pill while cutting it. The cutter is well made and accurately machined.
customer_reviews.author: Shep

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: I tried less expensive pill splitters. They uniformly pulverized the pills when I need to cut a pill into quarters, thereby wasting a large number of pills. While uniformity of dust was consistent with the cheaper models, uniformity of pieces was non-existent. These problems are gone with the Equadose. The cutting mechanism is easy and precise. There is no dust created, even when I split a pill into quarters. Plus, I can precisely control where the break occurs. Thus, any uneven pieces are all my fault. Even better, there is no sharp blade that could accidentally slice a finger. Spend a little more money and be much happier with your pill splitter.
customer_reviews.author: M and M Mom

customer_reviews.title: So efficient
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I have to set up my father's pillboxes and some are huge and have to be cut in half. This cutter is so much better than the flimsy plastic ones that eventually break after a few uses. I highly recommend this one. It does what it should with more accuracy than any other that I have used.
customer_reviews.author: KK Simmonds

customer_reviews.title: It’s SO worth the cost!
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing about 30 or so other pill splitters, I found this one. I didn’t want to spend so much on a splitter but I surely would have saved a ton if I just started here. My 8lb chihuahua needs an already small pill cut in half. It’s also super soft and would always crumble with other splitters. I begged my vet to cut them but it’s not something they like to do because the pills would even crumble for them. I just used this one for the first time and all of the pills split perfectly with ZERO crumbling. I’m IMPRESSED and STUNNED!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Reagan

customer_reviews.title: way overpriced without that much accuracy
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to a highly accurate splitter. Unfortunately, I did not find this one to be the case. Compared to some others, it does not hold the pill in position for the splitting process. I have other much cheaper splitters that do the same or better job. This item is way overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: gray beard

customer_reviews.title: Finally! A successful splitter!
customer_reviews.text: I have a round fat pill that is always crushed to several pieces in the blue pill splitter I got from the drug store. These pills are so expensive & I need 1/2 pill everyday. I’ve gone through 6 months of frustration trying to split them equally, or at least in 2 pieces. The best splitter so far has been my husband’s hunting knife......until this pill splitter. Great invention. Good old American ingenuity. It’s accurate 99.9% of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly and easily, even with my arthritic finters
customer_reviews.text: My doctor changed a prescription from 5 mg to 2.5 mg, so a pill-splitter seemed indicated. This one is beautifully engineered and manufactured and lives up to its top-notch reputation. It is solid – nothing flimsy about it. Splits the 5 mg tablets into halves so cleanly and so identical I think it would take a serious scientist to tell the difference. The two chambers serve as "pill bottles" to remind me of doses. There are only five-star options, but I'd give this ten.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Guy in Peachtree City

customer_reviews.title: Best pill splitter I have ever used.
customer_reviews.text: I Really like this product. It is harder than it looks to place the pill in the center, but when you do it splits cleanly and exactly where the pill was placed. Large flat pills like tums 1000s will still split but not as precisely and it is tricky to catch those pills because the plastic cover will not do it for you. Hard to get the hang of but definitely the best pill splitter I have owned. I have been through several clear plastic ones that always crack and the blade wobbles and is hard to line up and get to come straight down. Also I like run on sentences today for some reason.
customer_reviews.author: Jdunk2145

customer_reviews.title: Best cutter for my pills.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE that this pill cutter doesn’t crumble half of my pill. I’ve been using a clamshell pill cutter, but half of my pill tends to crumble. I have successfully cut three pills using this without any crumbling, so score! My one complaint is that you have to eyeball the halfway mark if your pill isn’t marked. As I read on some other reviews, it does take a little umph to make the cut, so it probably would be great for someone with arthritis in their hands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Pill Cutter
customer_reviews.text: I have a prescription that calls for 11⁄2 pills per dose and the pills are fairly small and very hard. I have tried a very sharp paring knife and a razor and usually end up with a shattered pill. I just received this pill cutter and used it for the first time last night. It's absolutely amazing. So simple to use and it cuts the pill cleanly in half. It's a little pricey compared to the standard pill cutter available at the local drug store, but it actually works without shattering the pill so it's worth it! I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: bmsguy

customer_reviews.title: Frightfully expensive and worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: As compared to all the other pill splitters I've owned, this one is the cat's ass. All the others become dull quickly and shatter the pill. This one should last a lifetime. The one weakness in the design of this pill splitter is that it doesn't "center" the pill, so it's possible to divide a pill in to (say) one third and two thirds instead of two halves. You have to pay attention but it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Murray in Costa Rica

customer_reviews.title: Impressive Pill Cutter
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed by how it makes clean cuts through the pills. The one I had before would break off bits of the pills and rarely cut the pills leaving equal halves. This pill cutter will last forever. It is made very well. I wish I invented this pill cutter!!! Lol Oh, I did try to go to questions@equadose.com to write a review there too. I would have like to receive the free curette set. 😊 Marlena
customer_reviews.author: Marlena

customer_reviews.title: The Best Pill Cutter
customer_reviews.text: I researched and read all reviews, and I selected this pill cutter to cut many different sized pills my older dogs now have to take. I am very pleased with this pill cutter because it works well, is not plastic, and it performs well. I like that it can be closed when cutting the pills so nothing spills out. Pills can also be stored in it for the next scheduled dose. I made a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Works and will pay for itself
customer_reviews.text: I was frankly dubious, even after watching the online video. I've broken lots of pills with inexpensive razor blade splitters. This one takes some getting used to but the picture is of a pill I split on the 3rd try. I actually pencil marked the pill at what I believe was the center point and it split the mark evenly even though I gave up trying to use the mark to guide me. I just eyeballed it and it worked. In my case, just splitting one pill a day for a month will pay for the splitter. My small, less than 1/4 inch pill was a bit hard to center with my large hands but it still worked.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L. Sheffield

customer_reviews.title: SUPER functionality
customer_reviews.text: To anyone reading this review, please believe what I'm saying. I have searched for years looking for a pill splitter that wouldn't shatter the pill or one that was big enough for the pill to fit to split. HONESTLY, this is the only pill splitter you will ever need, require, or want. This split one of the largest pills I have to take perfectly and with no shattering. My final words are IT WORKS GREAT!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dog Lover

customer_reviews.title: PLACING THE PILL
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to place the middle between the cutting blades. It has to be done manually, which will take time as it will slip in and out of position. This, basically, applies to any size pill. Sorry I actually bought this.
customer_reviews.author: book listener

customer_reviews.title: I Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: A terrific pill splitter. I am getting perfectly even cuts on scored pills. It is so much easier than all of the others I have tried. My small unscored pills are more of a challenge to get an even split, but I think with a little more practice my accuracy will improve. No more crushed pills and inaccurate doses. I’m able to split pills in about half the time it used to take on the plastic splitters. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Emery

customer_reviews.title: This is one of those "my favorite things"
customer_reviews.text: YES! Expensive, but finally something that cuts the danged pills evenly, no matter their size or shape. I have bought several pill cutters in the past and none have worked at all well....uneven cuts, shattered pills, some pills too big or to weirdly shaped to fit, plus cheap construction. This product, on the other hand, is made so well (solid) and works even better on all kinds of pills, that I am certain its the last pill cutter I will ever buy. You won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Chriis Evans

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: One of my son's medications is a tiny pill that I need to split in half and then quarter. I went through several pill splitters before purchasing this one. The razor blade splitters often cut unevenly, and attempts at quartering the pill resulted in crushed pills. This pill splitter works beautifully! I do need to position the pill at the top of the devise in order to get a clean cut. I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: jodi

customer_reviews.title: Crisp cuts, no shattering
customer_reviews.text: I had to go back to splitting pills to get the right dosages and grabbed the "usual" OTC pill splitter at the local pharmacy store. Even brand new it would not cut the pills smoothly. Usually one side or the other would crumble into a pile of fragments. Frankly I had my doubts about a cast product like Equadose, I thought a sharp razor-like blade was the solution. However, this product proved me wrong, I have nice clean 50/50 splits on my pills now. the only issue: it takes a little finesse and practice so the pill stays in place and doesn't roll away. That practice took about 3 pills worth and I am VERY happy.
customer_reviews.author: Bergie

customer_reviews.title: An excellent design constructed with quality materials
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tool. It works so much better than the inexpensive plastic cutters with steel blades. Those others don't consistently break or cut the pill at the desired location and usually break the pill into multiple, odd-sized pieces along with some tiny particles. This tool does the job right. It has great design and craftsmanship with enough heft to know it will be durable and long-lasting. I like the rotating plastic lid the keeps the pieces from flying off after the cut.
customer_reviews.author: P.A. CLARK

customer_reviews.title: Best one out there
customer_reviews.text: Tried them all, this works the best so far. Except for finding the exact center when the pill is not scored. I wonder if I'm missing something on that part? But still love the clean cut. I assume negative reviews about crushing the pills could be the pills were coated? I haven't tried with coated pills, but those are always hard to cut without some crushing. Very happy with this and much cheaper than continually replacing the ones I purchase at Walgreens.
customer_reviews.author: MAR - HB

customer_reviews.title: Impressive!  Glad to have it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am glad that I ordered it! After going through many pill cutters, I found the cutter/splitter. It comes with a lifetime warranty which means the company is 100% behind its products. It has amazing cutting any shaped pills nicely. The outside of it is fashionable and clean. It could be a little tricky to position orval pills. It also requires some strengths to squeeze it. This cutter will be great for all, except people have arthritis or weak grips.
customer_reviews.author: M. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Unless you're into microsurgery, don't waste you money on this product. It is poorly designed and engineered. If you're looking for a pill splitter that randomly breaks pills into thirds, quarters, fifths or unrecognizable pieces, this is the splitter for you. Just buy one for $3.00 from your local drug store.
customer_reviews.author: Janie Sleboda

customer_reviews.title: Cuts my 10 mg atenolol pills cleanly. Well built ...
customer_reviews.text: Cuts my 10 mg atenolol pills cleanly. Well built. It works as described. There are some caveats; it does require some dexterity and fair eyesight with smaller pills. I use it by placing my pill between my fingertips and aligning it as in my photo. I gently compress the splitter to hold the pill in place, close the cover and split the pill. If you are in a hurry or are "all thumbs" this is not for you. I cut a weeks supply of 10 mg pills in about 5 minutes. It requires that you align the pill. This thing will last forever.
customer_reviews.author: homey

customer_reviews.title: How good are you at steadying a small pill as you set up for the cut?
customer_reviews.text: i’m sad to say that I believed the written hype. First of all, it is not easy to center whatever pill you’re going to cut; you have to be very steady-handed, nimble-fingered and quite good at balancing that little baby as you try to get it “centered for the guillotine cut.” I suppose if you have a really big pill, it would be simple, but for the little pills we normally take, this gadget doesn't fit the bi- I mean the pill!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Laquidara

customer_reviews.title: Clean cut, no breaking or crumbling
customer_reviews.text: I got this pill cutter because I need to be able to cut small pills with no score line into halves and even quarters for a pet. My usual pill cutter isn't refined enough; the pill ends up breaking into odd size pieces and crumbling. This one cut perfect quarters on the first try. It also catches the two pieces in the compartments for easy storage until each piece is used. I don't know yet how it will hold up over time, but for now at least, this works much better than any other pill cutter I've used.
customer_reviews.author: PNW Customer

customer_reviews.title: This works great - but don't do what I did...
customer_reviews.text: I love this pill cutter. It can take a little bit of work to get the pill lined up, but it always cuts cleanly. I've been using it for months and was cutting some smaller pills this morning and for some reason didn't close the top before I squeezed it, and I caught my finger. It cuts fingers just as well as pills. I won't do that again, and I hope I can save someone else making this mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: My German Shepherd has to have one and one half of a Phenobarbital pill twice a day. For four months I have bought every pill splitter I could find because the pills were being split unevenly or crushed all together. I purchased the EQUADOSE and no more uneven or crushed pills. The pictures shows the other pill splitter results and the EQUADOSE results, perfect! These pills are too expensive and the money spent on the EQUADOSE was worth every penny. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: HotRodHeart

customer_reviews.title: Measure twice cut once
customer_reviews.text: I cried uncle after cutting pills for my mother for a few weeks using a knife and thought that there's got to be a gadget for this. I did research and read reviews and decided on this one. It's well-made, sturdy and performs like a charm. No more shattered, unequal halves. This is a comparison between knife and gadget, mind you. But, I successfully measured twice and cut once with the research as well as with the use of this product. I don't pre-cut a week's worth, I cut the one pill that needs splitting each morning because it comes out so satisfyingly perfect that it sets the tone for my day!
customer_reviews.author: M.A.

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC!
customer_reviews.text: FOR MANY YEARS I HAVE BOUGHT DRUG STORE PILL CUTTERS. I HAVE Always ENDED UP BEING FRUSTRATED BECAUSE THE PILLS WOULD Crush ETC. I SAW THIS CUTTER AND THE PRICE WAS CRAZY. ALSO, THE CUTTER WAS DIFFERENT. I PURCHASED THE CUTTER AND WAS EXCITED TO TRY IT. TO MY AMAZEMENT THIS CUTTER CUT THIS HUGH PILL IN HALF AS IT WAS NOTHING. THIS CUTTER IS ALSO A "PILL SAVER". THANK YOU, FOR THIS GREAT TOOL. GAC
customer_reviews.author: gloria coleman

customer_reviews.title: Keeps pills from crumbling!
customer_reviews.text: This device works wonderfully on small round and larger oblong pills that I need to halve for my Chihuahuas. They were crumbling or flying away when I tried cheaper cutters and sharp knives. It is a little tricky to line up the pills, but I got the hang of it after a few cuts. Feel free to try using razor blades and if that works for you, great, but this seems like a solid cutter that will meet my needs for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: KB in AZ

customer_reviews.title: Great pill cutter!
customer_reviews.text: After reading previous reviews I was slightly concerned this pill cutter wouldn’t work for me but it seemed like the best cutter I could find so I ordered it anyway. When I received it ( and after washing it and letting it dry!) I cut two of my tiny oblong pills with it and it worked perfectly! No tiny pieces of pill residue to be found. I will update this review if anything changes, but after using it a couple of times I am super impressed. And I love that the cutter acts as a storage container for the cut pills too.
customer_reviews.author: Penny L.

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: It seemed a little pricy but it is very well made and solid. I can’t see this thing ever breaking. I needed it to cut a very small pill which isn’t scored, and it did a good job. A couple extremely tiny fragments came off, but it was for the most part an even split. Both halves are separated into their own compartment, so even if you have bad luck or loose pieces you could still have half your dose separated for you. I’m glad I chose this over the bladed style splitters.
customer_reviews.author: Irish

customer_reviews.title: just does not work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pill cutter because it was expensive and different from the other types so I thought it might work better. It does not. Its hard to line up the pill so the jaws are centered. The pill invariably gets cut into two unequal pieces. Its hard to get the halves back out too. Save your money, this thing is worthless. I would have given it 0 stars if possible.
customer_reviews.author: suburban homeowner

customer_reviews.title: Easy, accurate, and sharp!
customer_reviews.text: Best pill cutter I've ever used! It's easy to use, highly accurate, and the dual blades make cutting a breeze. I have to split large, soft, triangular pills and this takes care of them with no crumbling or broken, wasted pills. Incredibly sturdy, too! I'll never need to buy another because it's so well-built, but if I ever did need to I'd buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Precision tool for your pills
customer_reviews.text: I've only had my pill splitter for a few weeks now, so I can't speak about long term issues, but so far it has been great. I have yet to have a pill shatter, and the pills have all split perfectly. My previous plastic splitter broke with more limited use, and this one feels like a well built, precision tool. It also works well as a pill box, if you only have a few smaller pills and pre-split them. I used it this way on a recent four-day trip. If there end up being issues in the future I'll update,
customer_reviews.author: Aphoid

customer_reviews.title: Great for cutting pills
customer_reviews.text: Really liked this pill cutter. I was nervous after reading other reviews and totally confused after using the Cutter, it works just like a charm. Even cuts in half a very difficult triangular pill. I really like this device. The only query I have is this really manufactured in the USA or are the parts from China and assembled here? The bottom line works great.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S. Joy

customer_reviews.title: It cuts good
customer_reviews.text: I dislike that the height where you put the pill is too short. I was cutting a small pill and yet it was too big to close the lid. I like that it cuts the pill without shredding the pill. I also like that I can easily clean it after cutting the pill. It is hard to find a better pill cutter. I tried 2 other ones and did not like them at all.
customer_reviews.author: joann

customer_reviews.title: What a great pill cutter!
customer_reviews.text: My cat has just been put on a daily medication for the foreseeable future. I have tried coating the pill in salmon oil. She licked it off. I tried putting it in a salmon flavored pill pocket. Worked once, then she ate around the pill. That part only matters because I did those things with shredded pills I cut using 4 other pill cutters. This pill cutter makes CLEAN cuts. Very clean! I have to cut a small oval pill into quarters, a task that none of the other cutters even came close to doing, and with this cutter, I can finally get it done! Thank you, Equadose!
customer_reviews.author: Janie D.

customer_reviews.title: Finally, A Pill Cutter that works
customer_reviews.text: Well built, substantial - heavier than expected. Best of all - it actually works. If for some unexpected reason this fails in the future (not likely given how substantial its build is) I would purchase another one without hesitation. Thanks for a perfect design that holds the halves until needed. Would highly recommend this cutter.
customer_reviews.author: Long Time Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High-Quality Product for Pill-Splitting
customer_reviews.text: I'm very satisfied with the Equadose tool for pill splitting. I've had my fill of cheap pill-splitters that never split pills correctly. It is very frustrating, but I guess you get what you pay for. It is wonderful to have a high quality product that looks good and functions well. The Equadose easily splits the pill in half and doesn't feel like it's going to come apart in your hands while doing so. I was able to figure out how to use it without referring to instructions, so it's very easy to use. I don't have a need to use it as a pill box, but if I did, I wouldn't hesitate doing so. Overall: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Dave & Ruthie T.

customer_reviews.title: Great for small pills
customer_reviews.text: Someone in my dog seizure group recommended Equadose for tiny pills we need to cut into fourths. I have not been disappointed! It's easiest to position the small pills with tweezers, because unlike some other pill cutters this one doesn't hold the pill in position for you (not an issue with large/regular size pills) but it's worth the extra time since it cuts clean and tiny pills don't get ruined.
customer_reviews.author: LissaMM

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Idea - Excellent, Excellent, Excellent!!!
customer_reviews.text: Throw every single one of those cheap made in China plastic pill splinters you have away. This little baby works every time. Neat, clean and even splits. No danger of finger cuts like you get on razor blade style cutters. Simple to use, clean design. Study, solid, strong. It will last for years and years. Buy it You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Wang Chung

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult to center the pill
customer_reviews.text: This is the most expensive and least useful pill cutter I have ever bought. The problem is twofold: First, as the pill must be inserted on its edge, gravity is working against you. Second, as most pills are small, it is very difficult to center the pill, and can only be done with the blades already close enough to hold the pill in place. This is a clear case over over engineering a simple concept into an elaborate and overly expensive design.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Kay

customer_reviews.title: WORST PILL CUTTER
customer_reviews.text: The less expensive pill cutters actually work better.....especially if you need to cut a pill in 4 pieces. This one is very strange! I had high hopes and I didn't like it. I went to Walgreens and bought a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Amy M.

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: I'm a disabled Desert Storm Veteran on morphine and needed a pill cutter that would halve the pills, it's crucial for morphine, yes this cutter is on the expensive side however it'll halve the pills almost perfect everytime with the occasional operator error and bad pill to cut. If you're in need of precision cutting then this is your tool, highly recommend watching the instructional videos, very easy to use once you have the technique mastered
customer_reviews.author: Army Dave

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Not accurate at all. Eyeing it just doesn't work. Maybe one time I got an equal cut. Going back to my 5.00 pill cutter from Walmart. It ruins pill just as easily as this one does.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality pill cutter that really works!
customer_reviews.text: When my doctor suggested increasing my dose 50%, I remembered the miserable cutters I've used in the past. They were worthless, pills crumbled, and as I pressed to cut I thought these cheap things were going to explode. I thought there must be a good one on the market and I found the Equadose. I've been using it every day for several weeks and I love it! My pills never crumble. I appreciate its high quality construction and that it's made in the USA. For me, it's been perfect, and I know it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: halnwheels

customer_reviews.title: Stiff cutter. Will not bend or move. Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I have a change in physical size of a medication. The new pills are very tiny. Anything plastic will not cut even close to half. This thing is one piece metals and if you carefully line it up will make a good clean cut. It should be wonderful on anything normal size or larger. Best pill cutter I have ever seen or used.
customer_reviews.author: William Morrison

customer_reviews.title: GREAT LITTLE GADGET
customer_reviews.text: This little gadget is great. It does take a bit of practice to get pills lined up properly between the - I don't want to call them "blades" because they're not razor blades, but they function as such. Once you get it down, though, you will be pleasantly surprised - it does indeed split pills leaving little or no crumbs, and with a more even split than I could get with the razor-blade type. (Which, despite the rubber "bumpers" that were supposed to hold the pill in place, still were hard to position - for me, anyway.) Very glad I found this!
customer_reviews.author: T. Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Far exceeds other pill splitters!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, this pill splitter is crazy expensive. But the QUALITY is worth every penny. There is no comparison at all between the cheap splitters available everywhere meds are sold and this sweet mama! This splitter is heavy duty and does not reduce pills into the fragmented, partially powdered, unequal pieces like those cheap plastic splitters do. This may not be the splitter you're looking for if you have just one or two pills to split, but this one will last a lifetime!
customer_reviews.author: Sacheen

customer_reviews.title: Great, once you get the hang of it!!
customer_reviews.text: Great, once you get the hang of it. I’m having to cut a 3 month supply of caplets in half. They split unevenly and with a lot of powder with my old pill cutter. With the Equadose, once you line the pill up, it’s a clean split. Well worth it!! My only complaint is it took me a few times to figure out how to line it up and lock it in place. But, now I’m happily splitting 90 tablets in no time.
customer_reviews.author: L. Sheryl Adams

customer_reviews.title: The most expensive isn’t always the best
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pill splitter based on some of the reviews. I was tired of the unequal results my $5.50 plastic pill splitter yielded. A pricey $29.95 had to give better results, right? Wrong. It’s worse. At least with my cheap splitter I could somewhat adjust/compensate the cut by forcing the plastic device to be off centered and it would usually compensate. For $29.95 this should be perfect, not 2/3 and 1/3 as shown in the picture. YMMV.
customer_reviews.author: Whymeworry

customer_reviews.title: Great pill cutter
customer_reviews.text: Feels solid and really well made. Not bulky and easy to carry in a pocket or whatever. Looks very nice too. But none of that would matter if it didn't actually work and this pill cutter actually works...and works really well. I've put up with a cheaper pill cutter for years and finally decided to splurge on this and I'm glad I did. No more messy powder and crooked cuts. This thing is a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: Fidget

customer_reviews.title: No razor to cut yourself on!
customer_reviews.text: After many unsuccessful tries with other pill splitters, I ordered this one. My mother in law is on several different medications, and the pills range from thin round, to oval, some that need splitting. This device not only splits them, but rarely do I have any little 'powder' from the pill left over.
customer_reviews.author: L. Rossi

customer_reviews.title: Cuts cleanly, even into tiny pieces.
customer_reviews.text: Love this. My old cat requires multiple pills split on a daily basis. I bought this a year ago to help halve, quarter, and even eighth his small pills. It does so cleanly, with minimal crumbling - and a year later, it looks and performs as well as it did when I bought it. The main difficulty I've had with it is figuring out how to center the pills. In my experience, this just takes practice. Some kind of etchings or markings on the bottom around the split point might help? Still, no regrets here. I went through multiple cheap plastic cutters that were tough to use. This has been a solid tool.
customer_reviews.author: Lynx

customer_reviews.title: $30 pill cutter?! YES!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because I figured for its price tag it has to be better than the piece of junk ones found at local pharmacies. I figured right. I almost didn’t buy it because going from a $5 pill cutter to a $30 one seemed a bit much. I’m so glad I did. I use it to cut unscored pills that are otherwise a pain to split. This little guy works GREAT! No crushing for me, so far I get a perfect split every time. I would highly recommend to folks in the same situation.
customer_reviews.author: Dickers
